dmca_clarifications: Hello,
   This app has been removed due to a copyright infringement claim  
[#819513490] and I filled out this counter notice before [#819521177] on  
June 15 and I have not heard anything more. The only response I've got was  
on June 16 saying you would investigate and get back to me. It is my belief  
that the original claim was false, and was only filed because of the  
similarity between the two apps, the only reason they were similar was  
because, as I said before, the two apps use the same api from the same  
website. Also because my app, in my opinion, was better, responded faster,  
looked nicer, and was not as "laggy". In fact, after my app was pulled from  
the market they made significant changes to UI and now it looks more like  
mine. They also used the name Bitcoin Trader on github where they have  
released the code as opensource under the apache licence.

So I'm requesting again to have my app reinstated to the market.

Thanks,
  Dave

PS: Could I get a better response other that we will investigate... Like  
maybe an estimate of how long it will take?
